channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Cognos Analytics
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Cognos Analytics

item.title: CVE-2021-38909|2024-08-04T01:51:20.916Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.1.7 and 11.2.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 209706.

item.title: CVE-2021-39036|2024-08-04T01:58:17.225Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.1 and 11.2 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 213966.

item.title: CVE-2021-39009|2024-08-04T01:58:17.684Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.1.7, 11.2.0, and 11.2.1 stores user credentials in plain clear text which can be read by a local privileged user. IBM X-Force ID: 213554.

item.title: CVE-2021-38946|2024-08-04T01:51:20.687Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.1.7, 11.2.0, and 11.1.7 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 211240.

item.title: CVE-2021-38903|2024-08-04T01:51:20.740Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.1.7, 11.2.0, and 11.1.7 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials. IBM X-Force ID: 209691.

item.title: CVE-2021-38904|2024-08-04T01:51:20.834Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.1.7, 11.2.0, and 11.1.7 could allow a remote attacker to obtain credentials from a user's browser via incorrect autocomplete settings. IBM X-Force ID: 209693.

item.title: CVE-2021-39045|2024-08-04T01:58:17.324Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.1.7, 11.2.0, and 11.2.1 could allow a local attacker to obtain information due to the autocomplete feature on password input fields. IBM X-Force ID: 214345.

item.title: CVE-2021-38945|2024-08-04T01:51:20.382Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.2.1, 11.2.0, and 11.1.7 could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, caused by improper content validation. IBM X-Force ID: 211238.

item.title: CVE-2021-38905|2024-08-04T01:51:20.617Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.1.7, 11.2.0, and 11.1.7 could allow an authenticated user to view report pages that they should not have access to. IBM X-Force ID: 209697.

item.title: CVE-2021-38886|2024-08-04T01:51:20.733Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.1.7, 11.2.0, and 11.1.7 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 209399.

item.title: CVE-2021-39047|2024-08-04T01:58:17.699Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics 2.0 and IBM Cognos Analytics 11.2.1, 11.2.0, and 11.1.7 are vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 214349.

item.title: CVE-2022-34357|2024-08-03T09:07:16.134Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics Mobile Server 11.1.7, 11.2.4, and 12.0.0 is vulnerable to Denial of Service due to due to weak or absence of rate limiting. By making unlimited http requests, it is possible for a single user to exhaust server resources over a period of time making service unavailable for other legitimate users. IBM X-Force ID: 230510.

item.title: CVE-2023-30996|2024-08-02T14:45:24.402Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.1.7, 11.2.4, and 12.0.0 could be vulnerable to information leakage due to unverified sources in messages sent between Windows objects of different origins. IBM X-Force ID: 254290.

item.title: CVE-2023-30996|2024-07-12T22:32:20.693Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.1.7, 11.2.4, and 12.0.0 could be vulnerable to information leakage due to unverified sources in messages sent between Windows objects of different origins. IBM X-Force ID: 254290.

item.title: CVE-2024-25053|2024-07-01T20:57:36.747Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.2.0, 11.2.1, 11.2.2, 11.2.3, 11.2.4, 12.0.0, 12.0.1, and 12.0.2 is vulnerable to improper certificate validation when using the IBM Planning Analytics Data Source Connection. This could allow an attacker to spoof a trusted entity by interfering in the communication path between IBM Planning Analytics server and IBM Cognos Analytics server. IBM X-Force ID: 283364.

item.title: CVE-2024-25041|2024-06-28T18:55:55.233Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.2.0, 11.2.1, 11.2.2, 11.2.3, 11.2.4, 12.0.0, 12.0.1, and 12.0.2 is potentially vulnerable to cross site scripting (XSS). A remote attacker could execute malicious commands due to improper validation of column headings in Cognos Assistant. IBM X-Force ID: 282780.

item.title: CVE-2024-25053|2024-06-28T18:53:48.828Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.2.0, 11.2.1, 11.2.2, 11.2.3, 11.2.4, 12.0.0, 12.0.1, and 12.0.2 is vulnerable to improper certificate validation when using the IBM Planning Analytics Data Source Connection. This could allow an attacker to spoof a trusted entity by interfering in the communication path between IBM Planning Analytics server and IBM Cognos Analytics server. IBM X-Force ID: 283364.

item.title: CVE-2022-34357|2024-02-24T15:38:49.771Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics Mobile Server 11.1.7, 11.2.4, and 12.0.0 is vulnerable to Denial of Service due to due to weak or absence of rate limiting. By making unlimited http requests, it is possible for a single user to exhaust server resources over a period of time making service unavailable for other legitimate users. IBM X-Force ID: 230510.

item.title: CVE-2024-25047|2024-05-02T20:09:21.479Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.2.0 through 11.2.4 and 12.0.0 through 12.0.2 is vulnerable to injection attacks in application logging by not sanitizing user provided data. This could lead to further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 282956.

item.title: CVE-2023-38359|2024-02-24T15:27:07.898Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.1.7, 11.2.4, and 12.0.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 260744.

item.title: CVE-2024-25047|2024-06-04T17:35:50.331Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.2.0 through 11.2.4 and 12.0.0 through 12.0.2 is vulnerable to injection attacks in application logging by not sanitizing user provided data. This could lead to further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 282956.

item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.1.7, 11.2.4, and 12.0.0 could be vulnerable to information leakage due to unverified sources in messages sent between Windows objects of different origins. IBM X-Force ID: 254290.

item.title: CVE-2023-32344|2024-02-24T15:29:33.526Z -- ibm -- cognos%20analytics
item.description: IBM Cognos Analytics 11.1.7, 11.2.4, and 12.0.0 is vulnerable to form action hijacking where it is possible to modify the form action to reference an arbitrary path. IBM X-Force ID: 255898.

A remote attacker could execute malicious commands due to improper validation of column headings in Cognos Assistant. IBM X-Force ID: 282780.
